snippet: Jonathan Williams hurt his left foot during a scrimmage on Saturday and will miss the regular season. Coach Bret Bielema said that surgery was needed.
abstract: University of Arkansas running back Jonathan Williams injures foot during scrimmage and will be out for entire season.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Williams hurt his left foot during a scrimmage on Saturday and will miss the regular season. Coach Bret Bielema said that surgery was needed.

headline.main: Arkansas Running Back Out for Season
